name: cagents-customer-experience
description: Customer Experience domain for cAgents V7.0 - Customer support, success management, experience optimization, and voice of customer programs. 18 tier-2 controller and tier-3 execution agents including CX directors, support managers, customer success leads, escalation specialists, knowledge managers, and more. Supports question-based delegation for customer experience workflows with controller coordination.
